18 import rospy
19 from collections import OrderedDict
20 from threading import Lock
21 
22 # Command Status
23 from niryo_robot_msgs.msg import CommandStatus
24 
25 from niryo_robot_rpi.msg import DigitalIO as DigitalIOMsg
26 from niryo_robot_rpi.msg import DigitalIOState, AnalogIO, AnalogIOState
27 from niryo_robot_rpi.srv import GetDigitalIO, GetAnalogIO
28 from niryo_robot_rpi.srv import SetDigitalIO, SetAnalogIO
29 from niryo_robot_rpi.srv import SetIOMode
30 
31 from .io_objects import PinMode
32 
33 
34 class AbstractIOPanel(object):
35  def __init__(self):
36  self._digital_outputs = OrderedDict()
37  self._digital_inputs = OrderedDict()
38  self._analog_outputs = OrderedDict()
39  self._analog_inputs = OrderedDict()
40 
41  self.digital_io_publisher = rospy.Publisher('/niryo_robot_rpi/digital_io_state',
42  DigitalIOState, queue_size=10, latch=True)
43 
44  self._publish_io_state_frequency = rospy.get_param("~publish_io_state_frequency")
45  self.analog_io_publisher = rospy.Publisher('/niryo_robot_rpi/analog_io_state',
46  AnalogIOState, queue_size=10, latch=True)
47  self._publish_analog_io_state_timer = rospy.Timer(rospy.Duration(1.0 / self._publish_io_state_frequency),
48  self._publish_analog_io_state_cb)
49 
50  self.set_io_state_server = rospy.Service('~get_analog_io', GetAnalogIO, self._callback_get_analog_io)
51  self.set_io_state_server = rospy.Service('~get_digital_io', GetDigitalIO, self._callback_get_digital_io)
52 
53  self.set_io_state_server = rospy.Service('~set_analog_io', SetAnalogIO, self._callback_set_analog_io)
54  self.set_io_state_server = rospy.Service('~set_digital_io', SetDigitalIO, self._callback_set_digital_io)
55 
56  self.set_io_mode_server = rospy.Service('~set_digital_io_mode', SetIOMode, self._callback_set_io_mode)
57 
58  def _publish_digital_io_state(self):
59  msg = DigitalIOState()
60  try:
61  for digital_input in self._digital_inputs.values():
62  msg.digital_inputs.append(
63  DigitalIOMsg(digital_input.name, digital_input.value))
64 
65  for digital_output in self._digital_outputs.values():
66  msg.digital_outputs.append(DigitalIOMsg(digital_output.name, digital_output.value))
67  except RuntimeError:
68  return
69 
70  try:
71  self.digital_io_publisher.publish(msg)
72  except rospy.ROSException as e:
73  rospy.logerr("IO Panel - {}".format(e))
74  return
75 
76  def _publish_analog_io_state_cb(self, _event=None):
77  self._publish_analog_io_state()
78 
79  def _publish_analog_io_state(self):
80  msg = AnalogIOState()
81  try:
82  for analog_input in self._analog_inputs.values():
83  msg.analog_inputs.append(AnalogIO(analog_input.name, analog_input.value))
84 
85  for analog_output in self._analog_outputs.values():
86  msg.analog_outputs.append(AnalogIO(analog_output.name, analog_output.value))
87  except RuntimeError:
88  return
89 
90  try:
91  self.analog_io_publisher.publish(msg)
92  except rospy.ROSException as e:
93  rospy.logerr("IO Panel - {}".format(e))
94  return
95 
96  @staticmethod
97  def _create_response(status, message):
98  return {'status': status, 'message': message}
99 
100  def _callback_get_analog_io(self, req):
101  if req.name in self._analog_inputs:
102  value = self._analog_inputs[req.name].value
103  elif req.name in self._analog_outputs:
104  value = self._analog_outputs[req.name].value
105  elif req.name in self._digital_outputs or req.name in self._digital_inputs:
106  return self._create_response(CommandStatus.DIGITAL_IO_PANEL_ERROR,
107  "{} is not an analog IO, but a digital IO".format(req.name))
108  else:
109  return self._create_response(CommandStatus.DIGITAL_IO_PANEL_ERROR,
110  "No GPIO found with this pin name (" + str(req.name) + ")")
111 
112  return {'status': CommandStatus.SUCCESS, 'message': 'OK', 'value': value}
113 
114  def _callback_get_digital_io(self, req):
115  if req.name in self._digital_inputs:
116  value = self._digital_inputs[req.name].value
117  elif req.name in self._digital_outputs:
118  value = self._digital_outputs[req.name].value
119  elif req.name in self._analog_outputs or req.name in self._analog_inputs:
120  return self._create_response(CommandStatus.DIGITAL_IO_PANEL_ERROR,
121  "{} is not a digital IO, but a analog IO".format(req.name))
122  else:
123  return self._create_response(CommandStatus.DIGITAL_IO_PANEL_ERROR,
124  "No GPIO found with this pin number (" + str(req.name) + ")")
125 
126  return {'status': CommandStatus.SUCCESS, 'message': 'OK', 'value': value}
127 
128  def _callback_set_analog_io(self, req):
129  if req.name in self._analog_outputs:
130  self._analog_outputs[req.name].value = req.value
131  elif req.name in self._analog_inputs:
132  self._analog_inputs[req.name].value = req.value
133 
134  elif req.name in self._digital_inputs or req.name in self._digital_outputs:
135  return self._create_response(CommandStatus.DIGITAL_IO_PANEL_ERROR,
136  "{} is not an analog IO, but a digital IO".format(req.name))
137  else:
138  # No pin found
139  return self._create_response(CommandStatus.DIGITAL_IO_PANEL_ERROR,
140  "No IO found for {}".format(req.name))
141  self._publish_analog_io_state()
142  return self._create_response(CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Successfully set value for {}".format(req.name))
143 
144  def _callback_set_digital_io(self, req):
145  if req.name in self._digital_outputs:
146  self._digital_outputs[req.name].value = req.value
147  elif req.name in self._analog_inputs or req.name in self._analog_outputs or req.name in self._digital_inputs:
148  return self._create_response(CommandStatus.DIGITAL_IO_PANEL_ERROR,
149  "{} is not a digital output.".format(req.name))
150  else:
151  # No pin found
152  return self._create_response(CommandStatus.DIGITAL_IO_PANEL_ERROR,
153  "No IO found for {}".format(req.name))
154  self._publish_digital_io_state()
155  return self._create_response(CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Successfully set value for {}".format(req.name))
156 
157  def _callback_set_io_mode(self, _req):
158  return self._create_response(CommandStatus.DIGITAL_IO_PANEL_ERROR,
159  "You cannot change the IO mode on this robot version")
160 
161  def shutdown(self):
162  for do in self._digital_outputs.values():
163  do.value = False
164 
165  for ao in self._analog_outputs.values():
166  ao.value = 0
167 
168 
169 class AbstractDigitalIOPanel(AbstractIOPanel):
170 
171  def __init__(self, lock=None):
172  super(AbstractDigitalIOPanel, self).__init__()
173 
174  if lock is None:
175  lock = Lock()
176  self.__lock = lock
177 
178  self._switches_name = []
179  self._publish_analog_io_state_timer.shutdown()
180  self._publish_analog_io_state()
181 
182  self._publish_digital_io_state_timer = rospy.Timer(rospy.Duration(1.0 / self._publish_io_state_frequency),
183  self._publish_digital_io_state_cb)
184 
185  def _publish_digital_io_state_cb(self, _event=None):
186  self._publish_digital_io_state()
187 
188  def _callback_set_io_mode(self, req):
189  if req.name in self._switches_name:
190  return self._create_response(CommandStatus.DIGITAL_IO_PANEL_ERROR,
191  "Can't change mode for switch pin, mode is fixed to OUTPUT")
192  elif req.name in self._digital_outputs:
193  if req.mode == req.INPUT:
194  new_input = self._digital_outputs.pop(req.name)
195  new_input.mode = PinMode.DIGITAL_INPUT
196  self._digital_inputs[req.name] = new_input
197  self._digital_inputs = OrderedDict(sorted(self._digital_inputs.items()))
198  else:
199  return self._create_response(CommandStatus.SUCCESS,
200  "IO already set as OUTPUT")
201  elif req.name in self._digital_inputs:
202  if req.mode == req.OUTPUT:
203  new_output = self._digital_inputs.pop(req.name)
204  new_output.mode = PinMode.DIGITAL_OUTPUT
205  self._digital_outputs[req.name] = new_output
206  self._digital_outputs = OrderedDict(sorted(self._digital_outputs.items()))
207  else:
208  return self._create_response(CommandStatus.SUCCESS,
209  "IO already set as INPUT")
210  else:
211  # No pin found
212  return self._create_response(CommandStatus.DIGITAL_IO_PANEL_ERROR,
213  "No IO found for {}".format(req.name))
214 
215  self._publish_digital_io_state()
216  return self._create_response(CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Successfully set value for {}".format(req.name))
